409.description: Package already in Miami, please check details and errors for further instructions.

get.description: Returns the list of packages that match the provided filters.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Possible values: es = Spanish, en = English

parameters.name: readyForPickUp
parameters.description: Returns only ready for pick up packages

packages.description: List of packages that match the provided filters

date.description: Date package was received or created

totalCharges.description: Total charges in USD if available

totalChargesLocal.description: Total charges in local currency if available

hasAnAlert.description: True if package has an alert

isThirdParty.description: True if package is from a shipper

isAccountFirstPackage.description: True if package is the first package of the account

hasWebInvoice.description: True if package has a web invoice

category.description: Possible values: 0 = Unknow, 1 = Invoice, 2 = Other, 3 = PackagePicture, 4 = POD_Signature

lastUpdate.description: Last date and time the package was updated

graphicStationId.description:
It represents a global stage in which the package is currently located. It could contain these values:
-1 = No stage
 0 = In transit to miami
 3 = In Miami
 4 = In transit to country
 5 = In country
 6 = Out for delivery
 7 = Ready for pickup
 8 = Delivered

cifvalue.description: Value that was declared to customs. CIF = Cost, Insurance and Freight

cifvalueLocal.description: Value that was declared to customs returned in local currency (The local currency will be calculated with the exchange rate of the day). CIF = Cost, Insurance and Freight

customsTicket.description: Customs ticket number, if available. It refers to DUA number, OEA number, etc.

dimensionsInches.description: Package dimensions in inches if available

volumetricWeight.description: Volumetric weight in cubic feet if available

totalItems.description: Total number of packages that match the provided filters

description.example: Aerotrack parameter can't be null or empty

401.description: Unauthorized: Full authentication is required to access this resource
